Aceb Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • w2/graph_.h, w2/graphcon.c, w2/graphdev.h, w2/graphgtk.c, wh/graph.h: sort out general App short cut keys (cntl-Q etc) in a better way.
  • w4/mainpick.c: change comman short keys for new graph call.
  • w5/lexsubs4.c, wh/acedb.h: add some utility calls to check strings against key names.
  • w9/: blixem_.h, blxFetch.c, blxmain.c, blxview.c: fix wrong strings in key files, fix pfetch calls, add short cuts for match sets and moving to match and new -c option.
  • wh/blxview.h: add match_set state to msp.
  • w4/gifcommand.c: remove redundant commands.
